# Art 

My work is primarily focused on minimalist and abstract art, using a mix of acrylics and mixed media to explore the emotional impact of color, form, and space. Drawing inspiration from the stillness of nature and personal reflection, I create pieces that encourage introspection and connection. Each work balances simple shapes, a restrained color palette, and subtle textures to evoke a sense of calm, contemplation, and depth.

View and purchase original paintings and artwork at [Saatchi Art](https://www.saatchiart.com/cristinacarrizosa?srsltid=AfmBOor7QF34xCyRj8s8SYTDANgva0d2FLMul333iss_B_u2kizqEZLg){target="_blank"}
:::
